tool.name: SbmlToSbol
tool.command: python -m sbml2sbol #if str($input_type_conditional.input_type) == "Collection": --input '${input_type_conditional.sbml_collection_input}' #elif str($input_type_conditional.input_type) == "Single File": --input '${input_type_conditional.sbml_single_input}' #end if #if str($rbs) == "true" --rbs True #else --rbs False #end if --max_prot_per_react '$max_prot_per_react' #if $tirs --tirs '$tirs' #end if --pathway_id '$pathway_id' --uniprotID_key '$uniprotID_key' --outfile '$sbol_outfile'

param.name: max_prot_per_react
param.label: The maximum number of proteins per reaction

param.name: pathway_id
param.label: Group ID of the heterologous pathway

tool.help:
usage: python -m sbml2sbol [-h]
--input INPUT [INPUT ...]
--outfile OUTFILE
[--rbs RBS]
[--max_prot_per_react MAX_PROT_PER_REACT]
[--tirs TIRS [TIRS ...]]
[--pathway_id PATHWAY_ID]
[--uniprotID_key UNIPROTID_KEY]
[--version]
convert rpSBML file(s) into one single SBOL file
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit
--input INPUT [INPUT ...] path to folder(s) containing rpSBML files and/or rpSBML file path(s)
--outfile OUTFILE specify output (SBOL) file
--rbs RBS Calculate or not the RBS strength (default: True)
--max_prot_per_react MAX_PROT_PER_REACT The maximum number of proteins per reaction (default: 3)
--tirs TIRS [TIRS ...] The RBS strength values (default: None)
--pathway_id PATHWAY_ID Group ID of the heterologous pathway (default: rp_pathway)
--uniprotID_key UNIPROTID_KEY Group ID of the heterologous pathway (default: selenzy)
--version show the version number and exit
